content.detailedDescription: Was driving east on rt 30 in montgomery, il with my wife and 2 yr old child. looked to the northern sky and seen two yellowish/orange fireballs floating in the sky. they appeared to be floating. they floated up, down, and to and from each other. i pointed them out to my wife and we both thought they were either ufo's or floating lanterns. after watching their movements, it was clear they were not floating lanterns, as they moved away from each other and came back to each other several times. we observed them for approximately 4 or 5 minutes before they faded or "burned out." they disappeared about 5 seconds apart. i kept watching the sky while driving but they never reappeared. this happened in the summer of 2011. i told my friend and family but no one believed me. i just read in my local newspaper that a local man recently observed ufo's in his area...A few miles away from wherei  observed similar objects in 2011.
content.summary: Looked like orange glowing fireballs

content.detailedDescription:
My eight year old granddaughter was letting the dog inside the house, and i was right behind her.  as she was letting in the dog, she looked up and said "look papa" as she pointed above.  i didn't see anything initially, stepped outside and looked around the house and sure enough, saw three round, orange lights moving at a very high rate of speed from east to west.  there was no doubt, this was not an airplane or helicopter.  there was no sound to it and the speed really stood out. they moved so fast and then faded away.

i was absolutely stunned when i saw this, and to know i wasn't the only one seeing it, as my granddaughter was the one who drew my attention to it. this was definitely not like anything i have ever seen before in my life! i've attached a drawing our 8 yr old granddaughter drew of what she saw, then a drawing of what i saw.
content.summary: Three orange, round lights/objects traveling east to west @ high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend were driving east on cornell rd. on our way to get gas, and as we were passing the arco gas station we both noticed some disc shaped crafts coming up above the horizon from the northeast.  we then stopped at the arco gas station and began taking pictures with our cell phone camera.  the pictures obviously do the event no justice but at least we caught them.

one of the pictures has serious motion blur and cause the lights to take the shape of nines.  so just know that the objects did not in any way look like that to my eyes.
content.summary: On christmas eve 2012 spotted 10+ disc shaped objects in hillsboro, oregon

content.detailedDescription: We were moving supplies into storage of our workplace. we were all in a tennis stadium so we pretty much had a 180 degree look of the sky. as i was placing somthing down on the ground my coworker said look and i looked up but didnt see anything. then he said look, look right here. thought he was just trying to make me look up for a joke but then he said look its an object. then i finally spotted it and it was a dull silver peanut looking object spinning at a medium rate of spee, going in a straight path. at first i thought of all possibilities of what it could be, a ballon but a ballon would more rather kinda float wobbly and keep rising. then i dismissed it as a airplane or helicopter, it had no wings or propellers. it was a constant spinning in a straight path and everytime it spun the sun would reflect off of it. was a dull silver till the sun would hit it, shined really bright when it did shine. then as it finally passed under the sun, it may sound stupid but i looked down for a bit cause the sun was hurting my eyes then looked right back up, it was gone. when i first saw it, i immediately knew it was nothing i have never seen, and kept my eyes on it for the most part, till it disappeared. i was kinda in lost of words and in a gaze the whole time. my coworkers kept questioning what it was. lastly i lost sight of it as i explained earlier when i looked down to refocus my eyes. thank you for your time.
content.summary: Was moving things into storage and friend looked up and saw an object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My partner was napping on our bed and i came in to plug my cellphone in, and happened to be down close to the floor to find the plug. i looked up out of the window and saw what looked like a beautiful formation of white shimmering birds -- i yelled at my partner to sit up & put his glasses on to see. then i looked closer and saw that there were lights, glowing lights. they were moving north over our building in victorian village, columbus. my partner couldn't see them so we ran outside to try to find them as they headed over the building. ran all around the block, every which way, and no sign of any of the lights. they were neither in a 'v'-formation or a straight line -- a sort of very intricate inter-woven pattern, diamonds maybe?, that i'd have to see again to describe. strangely enough we'd both seen the exact same thing with 2 other witnesses in a columbus-area grocery store on the day neil armstrong died. looked it up all over the internet & nothing ever explained. (august 25th, 2012). very, very moved by & curious about these lights. would love to know if anybody else has seen them today. (no chem/vapor trails in the sky, either ... ) 

heard a helicopter afterward, while filing this report.
content.summary: Large formation of many white orbs travelling swiftly ne; lost sight from my window; could not find them outside in the sky afterwards

content.detailedDescription:
Octagon shaped bright grayish ship in sky, near cameron texas on highway 36. blinking. fast. scary

i must preface, i'm somewhat nervous to have to explain something of this nature. never in a million years would i have thought it remotely possible in reality.... 

last night my son and i were driving on hwy 36 around 11:30 on our way to my mothers house in coppers cove tx. in the distance we noticed a very bright flashing light. my first thought was that it could be a plane, helcopter or a signal tower with unuasually bright lights. 

we continued to watch it when suddenly it was right on above of our suv! there are few words that will effectively relay to anyone that wasn't there just how large and utterly surreal looking this thing was. it was shaped like an octogan with flashing lights on all sides. it looked like a building floating in the sky. it had debth/structure to it that's hard to put into context. 

i was in shocked and as a mother i became fearful this thing could be a potential threat considering how close it was. 

so i stepped on the gas to get a! way from it. i was driving way over the speed limit and not looking back when it occured to us to take a picture or video. my son was in the back filming what was left of it at that point. both my son and i were just floored by what was happening. 

i'm extremely dissappointed we didn't think soon and capture the object in solid form. when we first saw the object it was about 400 meters above us, close enough for us to realize its enormous size, hexagonal shape, and its grey/concrete color. 

by the time my son had pulled out a camera and moved to the back of the vechile to film, it appeared to have distanced itself subtaintally from us, at least a few miles away.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Octagon shaped bright grayish ship in sky, near cameron texas on highway 36. blinking. fast. scary

content.detailedDescription: We were standing on our rear deck which faces south-west. the movement of the light and the absense of a strobe light caught my attention. my first thought was that it was a commercial jet which is why i watched the light closely for any sign of a strobe. it moved at a speed consistent with a commercial jet at cruising altitude. as i focused on the light watching for a strobe light, the light became much brighter and larger-roughly doubling in size-brighter than but about the same size as jupiter which was to the right of orion. it was at this moment that i pointed it out to my wife who's eyes picked up the brightening of the light. the light became steadily smaller and fainter as it moved upward and to the right (approximately 1:00 o'clock trajectory) until it was no longer visible. the duration from the time the light becoming brighter until it disappeared was about 2 to 3 seconds and covered a perceived distance of 2 fingers held 2" apart at arms length. the night was clear and cloudless, there was no vapor trail visible and there was no engine sound. at the time of the sighting, it was quiet enough to have heard jet engine sounds of a commercial jet at a typical cruising altitude. the trajectory combined with the steady decrease in size and brightness gave the impression that the light was moving upward and away from us at a slight rightward angle.
content.summary: Moving white light that became brighter and larger as it moved and faded, became smaller then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was with a friend in my car. he was driving south/south east on the main highway in las vegas, nv, the 95 south. he said: "what is that?," and i turned to look up through the windshield. there was a huge, oval shaped object that seemed almost dimly lit all around. it emitted a dim haze. it was farther away in the distance by a mountain range closely outside of the city area to the left of the highway. there were two black helicopters circling the object, shining spotlights on it. we watched this happen for four minutes until the object was behind us. i turned to look, and it changed position abruptly and with extreme speed. the helicopters re-positioned themselves to apparently attempt to shine their spotlights on it again. after about a minute of this, it was gone. the helicopters then hit each other with the spotlights as if the light was no longer blocked by the object. they then proceeded to shine spotlights on the mountain, and then they stopped and flew south east.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: dimly lit, oval-shaped object seen by drivers on highway; it was being pursued by helicopters.

content.detailedDescription: Looked out window, was looking at possible light snow flurries. noticed solid black object just hovering then it went down direction and started circling slow to fast shot up, then just vanished.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Boomerang like object hoverd the circled and vanished

content.detailedDescription: Back in the late 70's, outside with other neighbor girls and we were camping in my back yard.  it was a clear, summer night and we were up late so we walked up our road just for something to do...About 5 of us all saw an orange sphere to the s.E. up along the horizon above some cornfields.  we were all excited and knew it was a ufo.  it just switched on like a light, didn't seem to arrive from anywhere....At least 500+ feet away or more from us.  we were all very excited but some also were scared.  to put the size in perspective, it was a larger than the biggest moon i've ever seen.  it quickly darted off to the left just a little, then straight back to the right again before it went out.  later the next day we asked some other kids we knew down the street further away from where it happened, and they also said they even saw it and described it to us exactly.  there are some high tension power lines that run in the general direction past where the sighting was, over the ridge....But we did not hear of anything that would explain it was caused by the power lines.
content.summary: Glowing bright orange-red sphere above a dark night horizon.  darted back and forth before switching off.  bigger than a full moon in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Daughter was out the back door (facing north nw) letting dog out at 1953 hrs noticed two round lights in the western sky moving to the east and no idea
what they were but she couldn't miss them.  she then called mom and dad out to see the spectacle.  the two orange/red lights which  which stayed perfectly spaced at the same altitude not wavering at all moved to the east or ene and were out of sight in a short time,  too short to locate binoculars or camera. i lost sight of the objects far to the east or ene when one of them fizzled out and shorty after that the other disappeared too.  of course we three we dumbfounded with what we saw.  my first explanation was that it was illuminated lanterns moving across the sky.  only thing is there was very little wind and they looked like they were self propelled and going at a much higher rate of speed than the environment at that time.  the two lights never wavered in distance from one another.  also there was some cloud cover but the clouds did not interfere with the view of the objects.  when we went back into the house we noticed to the south the moon appeared from some cloud cover.  my best recollection of viewing time was just about 2 minutes and the time was us navy time with which my watch is synchronized at precisely 1955 to 1957 hours, with my daughter's viewing time maybe 30 to 40 seconds morel
content.summary: From the west two red/orange, yellow/pink lights or objects traveling east or  ene airplane like speed side by side      ene

content.detailedDescription: I was in the kitchen cooking at about 8 pm,i turn in front of window cause i just notice some flashing, i look at it, all i saw was lights flashing on the object did not look very big so  i run to the living room window to see closer, but i saw it take off so fast in seconds it was so far away all i saw was the lights flashing,i did'nt say  nothing for a long time because i felt everyone were going to say i was lying, that's what i would of said to because i could believe it myself of what i saw.I lost sight of it when the i could'nt see the lights anymore. these all i can say, i could say these before but please don'nt think i'm crazy but i still have a hard time believed what i saw. sorrry but no evidence no pictures, i was"nt prepare for something like these.
content.summary: Round with top, look like grey color  lots of lights diffrent colors,flashing lights .,

content.detailedDescription:
Watched two objects come from the east slowly travelling west and southwest at approximately 11:00 pm 2/24/13 through 2:30 am on 2/25/13.Same objects as i have reported on 2/16/13,2/20/13,and 2/24/13 in the am hours.
   they appear as bright stars until you see them move,they have multi-colored lights red,blue,green,and white/yellow that blink randomly and last night i noticed they tip on side revealing a round,disc shape bottome with a ring of green lights rotating around object.
   movements are from a hovering standstill,to slow linear path,to wobbling side to side (possibly small circles),up and down in elevation,usually from east to west southwest or once northwest.
   when very close to directly in front of my home last night,my wife standing in front yard observed a military type jet fly at these objects and i heard it pass over our home,the objects disappeared momentarily and reappeared on the west side or behind our house too quickly for normal aircraft.
   i contacted district mufon person to ask for investigators as i am becoming concerned for my family's well being as sightings are more frequent and closer.
  we are observing objects through 8x rifle scope and binoculars,our camcorder is currently broken and 3x zoom camera is useless in taking a good picture.Trying to fix or replace our camcorder and hope to get it on tape as evidence.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4th sighting of same object since 2/16/2013 except there where 2 objects this time

content.detailedDescription: Saw 2 objects that had mainly red lights that seemed to pulse but were always on and an occasional white light.   the objects moved slowly at the same altitude and speed.   one followed the other.   distance between was probably 100 feet (approximate), far too close for most airplanes.   they were as big as passenger airliners which we can hear when they go over our house.   these were perfectly silent and moving slowly.   the distance between the 2 vehicles never varied nor did their altitude.   it was like what you would see if one car were pulling another with a rigid tether between them.   looking through a monocular i could see three lights in tri-corner positions on both ufo's.     i would say that we observed them travel from south to north with only one slight veering to the west and then back to a direct south north direction for a distance of 12 miles.   we have open vistas.   there were other aircraft in the area as usual on normal flight patterns.   most are west to east or east to west.  these craft just flew beyond our area of vision.   i read an entry on another sight that also occurred tonight about an hour earlier than ours that sounded similar to this one but from rockingham nc which is approx. 2 hours south east from here.   we observed this from our deck, then our front porch and then from the north side of our house in the yard.  my husband had just walked outside to look at the stars and moon.   the night sky was so clear and beautiful.   we are star gazers.   we are so familiar with aircraft because we live on a regular flight path and noticed immediately that these were different.
content.summary: 2 triangle objects observed with monocular and without

content.detailedDescription: Feb 14th thursday around 7:00pm 2013, neighbor calls to report a odd light moving over our home and now is hovering above, running to my room to grab my cam, i run out front to look up and see one big disc i took video and photos when the disc looks to blow apart into four smaller orbs of light, two moved south or s.E. other two moved in the area of south first street, then a 2nd dark triangle like a ship came back above the house this time i called six other neighbors that saw this also with me, it looked like a lot of dark blue to white stars very close to each other one neighbor said, everone else said the dark thing in the sky looked like a large ship above my home.
content.summary: Feb 14th thursday 2013 around 7:00pm, neighbor reports a odd light moving over our house.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i started seeing an object in the sky over a year ago. we live in a very wooded area. there is no light pollution. we thought of it as a joke at first. everyone who came to our home saw it. we called it our light. as time went on the object got closer. it got to the point we could see it in the scope of our gun, but the object was constantly moving. there is a large object that we know is lower than the stars because when it is extremely overcast and cloudy, we can still see it. this tells us it is in the atmosphere. along with the larger object, there is always three smaller ufo's that change colors very quickly. these objects move faster and in ways that our conventional aircraft simply can not. we would love to know what these things are. there is no way these are weather balloons or objects reflecting light. we have hours of footage and pictures of the objects. at one point they got so close to the house and tree line it scared us. we did not see the objects for quite sometime after two jets flew over the house chasing it. the fighter jets were in combat mode trying their best to keep up, but it was like the ufo's were just teasing them. every time the aircraft got close the ufo's would just go from one point in the sky to another point in the sky in almost the blink of an eye. it has been in the past week that the objects have returned. if anybody has any answers we would love to hear and explanation; because, we are running out of reasonable explanations. these objects go vertical to horizontal in no time at all. it is quite scary.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: One big object, three small objects

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside and seen a bright object in the sky. it had a very large red light 
on one side and a large blue light on the other side. the object was flying right to left
and ascending and descending. and the lights were flashi
ng on and off. when the red and blue lights were off i could see that  there was
a small white ligjt on the bottom. i watched it for 10 mins. then i seen it h 
over then the lights/object descended toward the ground. i dont kno if it landed because the houses in front of me blocked my view.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I walked outside my house and observed a bright object in the north sky. as i am watching it, it is flying west and abruptly flies east. it has a very large red light on one side and a bright blue light on the other side.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 7:35 pm on 2/24/13 i walked out my back door to let my dog out. the back yard faces east and my home is situated near the tucson national golf resort so i can clearly see mt lemon in my east direction and i have no obstructions like trees or other homes. i noticed two very large yellow-orange orbs floating in a direction that looked as if it was traveling due west right to my location. these orbs were very bright, never changing their color and were about the size of a aspirin at arms length held away. these two light objects were the same distance apart. i watched them move towards me for about one minute in length when they made a curved sloping directional change, heading south and then south east. it looked as if they wanted to hug the mountain curvature. the two lights started to rotate a bit as if to tumble but never did their distance apart change. i could not tell if it was distance or if simply one light was dimming but as it traveled away from my location one light and then the other light disappeared. there was no sound. interesting note is that as it traveled closer to my location, dogs in the neighborhood began to bark. i had no time to run into the house to grab a camera as i was not about to miss the event. the whole sighting lasted approximately 2-3 minutes.
content.summary: 2 very large orange orbs that stayed the same distance apart while travel

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a party with a friend when i went outside on the roof for a cigarette. it was cloudy, drizzling and sporadically windy out. when i was just about done with my cigarette my friend came outside and joined me on the roof. we were talking for about 5 minutes or so when my friend looked up and yelled, "please tell me that's a plastic bag, ...Or something!!" and pointed to what he was starting at.

i looked up and saw this bizarre, black object sort of wobbling a few hundred feet above us. if i had to guess i would say it was slightly larger than a helicopter. its shape is very difficult to describe but it looked kind of how my friend first interpreted it - like a black plastic bag with these appendages, or "handles", on the top. it had no lights. completely black. the color was very strange; almost like an absence of light, like it was absorbing light, if that makes any sense. just totally and completely dark and stood out surprisingly well against the grey clouds above it.

it wobbled in place for about 3-4 seconds then started moving off in a straight path at an extremely fast pace (way faster than any helicopter or airplane i've seen at that altitude). it moved very purposefully and was unaffected by the gusts of wind that were bombarding the city. it was definitely not a plastic bag due to it being solid in shape, at least the size of a helicopter and travelling in a straight path at tremendous speed. i do not believe it was any conventional aircraft either because of its shape, having no lights and the fact that it was silent.

perhaps the strangest part of all was as it took off towards the harbor it looked like it maintained its size even though it was further away (we saw it go behind a building that was at least a mile a while so we knew it had traveled away from us). the fact that it got smaller at first and then larger while also being further away really freaked us out. my friend said "lets get the hell out of here" so we headed back to the party and didn't discuss it for most of the night other than an hour later when my friend asked out of the blue, "that thing was a solid, wasn't it? it definitely wasn't a plastic bag, huh? ...Damnit. what the hell..." then stopped talking about it again and haven't discussed it since.
content.summary: Dark, black object seen travelling low and at tremendous speed silently.

content.detailedDescription: While traveling north on th 65 south of mora, mn. i noticed 3 blue lights coming from the east. they made the shape of a triangle. there were no visable strobe lights on the object. about a football field behind is a plane with lights on and strobes on following. i would say they were less than 1,000' above the ground. both crafts continued west without changing course. the encounter lasted less than 3 minutes.
content.summary: While traveling north on th 65 i noticed 3 blue lights shaped like a triangle moving west  being followed by a plane.

content.detailedDescription:
I was moving my car and looked up to see five hovering lights
 they were orange and red. three were at top in triangle pattern and two hovered below spinning in circles. they slowly drifted up and away over the horizon and out of sight. i was certain they were not airplanes or helicopters. felt immediately that they were ufo. my heart jumped.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Five orbs. three in triangle.  two circling below. hovered over horizon. drifted out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: Driving east bound on a local street mysellf and two others witnessed a group of lights that appeared moving towards us in a westerly direction , there were airplanes on the usual north westerly flight path climbing out of mia airport and the airplanes were above these lights. i decided to pull over and the three of us got out the car , as they got closer i realized that these were not aircraft but some kind of orb . they were bright as  what a flare would look like however there were climbing steadily in a westbound heading and began to get closer together they then headed north bound then faded above us , there were no clouds around them them simply faded and vanished all at the same time.  i can compare them to when you stere up a fire and the hot embers rise .. i am a trained observer and work around aircraft all the time and i know  that these were not any kind of helicopter or airplane.
content.summary: Driving east bound on a local street mysellf and two others witnessed a group of lights that appeared moving towards us in a westerly direction , there were airplanes on the usual north westerly flight climbing out of mia airport and the were above these

content.detailedDescription: Feb 24, 2013 6:11 pm. i was standing in my back yard around a campfire looking at the northern sky.  i saw this extremely bright object traveling across the sky.  it wasn't flashing just constant bright  light just like a star but a lot brighter and bigger  than any star in the sky.  i watched it for about 15 seconds when it ejected an object out of it.  a small orb glowing bright blue and it looked like a halo around it lilt up the sky around it for about 10 seconds then went out.  my son got my binoculars and i followed it for about another 15 seconds when it changed colors to orange and then blood red and then it just vanished gone disappeared.  there was 3 very high altitude planes over head when ufo was there and after it left..
content.summary: Bright starlike object bigger and brighter than any star i have ever seen

content.detailedDescription:
This is the 3rd sighting of the same object in the past two weeks near our home,looks like a very bright star except it moves with red,blue,green,and yellow/white lights that light up in random rotational order.We have observed this object on the 16th,20th,and 24th of february 2013 all sightings were first noticed in the 1:30 am time frame for an hour or longer each time.We observed object through binoculars and an 8x power rifle scope.It is disc shaped with a larger half sphere on bottom and smaller half sphere on top,it turned sidewise several times when moving to reveal a ring of green lights rotating around circular shape.Other lights pulsed on and off randomly,but continually except when airplanes come into nearby airspace. now has my family concerned about our safety because of regular sightings although it has not approached our home closer than approximately 1/4 mile away.Always observe slowly moving away to the southwest until it disappears over horizon.
    i would be grateful if some ufo investigators would come observe this object to verify what my wife,son,and i have witnessed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Third time in 2 weeks starlike object with multi colored lights observed near home stopping,moving,going up and down,

content.detailedDescription:
My son in law went outside the back door of his house to talk to wife and a friend.  was standing there, noticed nothing, no sounds, nothing.  looked up and saw these 3 lights in a triangle.  two ride and a green.  watch for a few minutes did and the thing just sat there.  took out his cell and took a picture.  he did not tell anyone except his wife.  today, he we were having a family dinner and he pulled out the phone and said look at this.  we all looked at the picture and thought what the heck.  i had him send it to my email address so i could make the picture bigger.  when you make the picture bigger, it actually looks like 4 circular with a dozen light. 

the son in law is really not into ufo's so he did not do anything more that
just take the picture and forget about it.  it resembles a lot of the pictures i have seen on the tv shows.
content.summary: 3 bright lights in a triangle

content.detailedDescription: my encounter was on january17 2013 i was on state road 51 near tennals on us 19.   it was approximately 6:20 to 6:30 when i noticed the light in the rear view mirror of my truck i stopped and backed up. i slowed and stopped  so i could observe more closely the light was white on each side and red in in the center.I watched for two or three minutes before deciding to leave. state road 51 is only a two lane road but the light seemed to be jumping from one side of the road to the other.I remember where it was because it was situated over the old railroad bed, which sits on top of a small rise.  i was thinking of getting out of the truck to watch the light more closely but decided against it.  it was hunting season and i did not know if maybe a hunter may need help. but i knew of no emergency light that had white lights on the outside and a red light in the center. let along one that seemed to jump across two lanes of a highway in rapid succession. when i returned that afternoon i stopped to look at the location i suspected the light was located 20feet before and 20 feet after but could see no disturbances and no sigh of any car or truck parking although it is rough ground. i felt secure in my truck and decided not to get out.I had a doctors appointment to get to and decided not to stay. i lost sight of the light as i went down a dip and around a curve to us19.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Egg,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Obsurved strange light in rear view mirror

content.detailedDescription: On my way home driving from work and after running an errand i saw four amber colored spherical shaped lights. they were flying slowly in an odd formation. the lights were larger than aircraft lights. they also did not have the same color as airplane lights. the sighting occurred in murfreesboro,tn at approximately 6:55pm on a clear cloudless night on feb. 24th 2013. other cars in the area seemed to slow down and observe the lights as well. they were totally silent as i lowered my car window to make certain they were not known aircraft. i observed them in awe as they looked strange with no blinking directional light and totally silent. they went from four light to three to two and finally i saw the last one slowly fade like on a dimmer switch. i actually followed the direction they were flying in the event they became visible again but i never saw them after a short detour on my way home to find them. i am reporting this in case others do the same and confirm my sighting.
content.summary: Four bright steady amber lightsi pea size odd formation-faded out one at a time.

content.detailedDescription:
On february 24, 2013 as i was driving home from work at around 6:50pm, i noticed some lights in the sky. it was a full moon out and no clouds. i was on richmond rd in rockingham, nc. this is a well lit residentual area. i could see some light just over the trees and as i watched them they seemed to be moving very slow much slower than a c130 transport planes that we often see in the area. it was almost like it was gliding or hoovering. as the area opened up some and there was less trees i could clearly see that there was 2 of the objects. 1 behind the other. i pulled into the parking lot of roberdel baptist church to try and get a picture of them. as i pulled in and parked i turned my truck off and i already had my window down and these objects made no sound. the objects then banked to their right and i could not get a picture of them. i started my truck up and tried to follow them to try and get a better spot to view them. as i crossed the stoplight which is less than 500 yds from where i pulled in to park i noticed that they had picked up speed and were moving faster. by the time i got another 1-2 miles down the road they were far enough away from me that i could not follow them. i had already called home and told my wife to look outside and see if she could see anything but she could not. right after they banked to the right i had noticed what seemed to be an airplane coming towards them. when i got home i told my wife what i had seen and she said it was probably something military , but not 5 minutes later after she said that, 2 big airplanes (c130 i guess) came flying over just above treetop level going in the same direction that the 2 objects were going. they were low enough to vibrate the house. i went outside and noticed a lot of planes in the sky(small blinking lights). it is now 7:15pm and i have to go and pick my daughter up from church. i tell her about it and as we are coming home she tells me that she sees some lights also. i could not see them because they were too far to the right side to look at and drive safely. when we get home we get out and notice 4 blinking lights that are in the shape of a square almost like helicopters in formation but no sound but at the distance they were i thought i would have heard something. they were flying from north to south. time is about 7:45pm.

i have never had an experience like this before because i can usually explain it away, but what got me on this was that there was no sound from the 2  boomerang objects and when they banked i could make out lines on one of them and then all the plane traffic in the area after that.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed while driving home from work 2 boomerang shaped objects with lights that seemed to move like a hanglider then bank to right as i tried to take a picture of them

content.detailedDescription: On 2/23/13 i let my dog outback to pee and from the corner of my eyes i noticed this bright orange orb or light flying low across the sky with a plane heading toward it from se to ne then another one . almost in pairs of 2-3 in a straight line one after another.  in the photos if you look to the right side of pics you can see some through the trees.I yell  to my fianc��� to grab every cell or camera and film it which she did. a few of the orbs looked like the merge together or crossed paths!!! the re aligned.The as they were passing us a strange downpoor of rain haerd rain came down just in our area!!!! as some police or firetrucks started flying by the street toward that direction. we didnt get a good look since we were lookin up trying to figure out what was going on .. abby ran in the house. then my fiances camera with new batteries died/shut off shortly after we started filming! about 4 orbs into filming. then she brung her cell camera out and started taking photo and said it was blurring and nothing showed up on her cell. we do have a video and a few pics on her camera..One of the strangest things i have ever seen! the was viewable from jensen beach to port saint lucie. i felt mesmerized at what we were witnessing...  picture the color of a orange street light but huge and about 10-12 of them flying by   very odd night..
content.summary: 10-12 orange orbs lights in a row flying all in one direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was on 68th street and mcdowell northbound in scottsdale, az.  i was speaking on the cell phone with my fiance and was stopped at the signal waiting for it to turn green.  i looked out the window to the left because i could hear the 2 black helicopters hovering over the reserve base on mcdowell.  i looked up above the helicopters and saw the glowing red-orange spherical object moving very slowly.  it reminded me of satellite movement but it was much lower in the horizon; but it was much higher in the horizon than the normal landing plane flight path of sky harbor airport that is right next to this base.  i watched it as i told my fiance that i was watching a ufo, waiting to see the blue and white lights that accompany the red light in a plane; but they never appeared.  i watched it for about 2-3 minutes as it pulsated in brightness and moved slowly in a erratic pattern.  i watched until i looked at the signal.  i looked back and it was gone.  the black helicopters remained there.  i got off the phone, and we live north of the base and my fiance went outside to look at the helicopters.  he confirmed later that they remained there.  they were even there when i got home about 20 minutes later.
i was excited to have seen something i couldn't explain but wondered if it was base related or if it was something unknown to them that they were closely monitoring.
content.summary: Glowing object much higher than plane flight path above military base and military helicopters
